en.Multicolor booster makes match with any: The Multicolor Booster matches with any color!
en.Bomb booster removes obstacles in your w: The Bomb Booster removes obstacles in your way!
en.Aim booster helps you plan your moves!: The Aim Booster helps you to plan your moves!
en.Need more moves? Use extra moves booster: Need more moves? Use the Extra Moves Booster!
en.Match 3 or more bubbles!: Match 3 or more bubbles of the same color!
en.Clear top bubbles to reveal ceiling ligh: Remove the bubbles in the  top row to reveal the lights on the ceiling!
en.Clear bubbles around animals to free the: Remove the bubbles surrounding the animals to set them free!
en.Clear bubbles around the ghost to free h: Remove the  bubbles surrounding the ghost to set him free!
en.Match color of monster to defeat him!: Match the color of the monster to defeat it!
en.Hit cloud bubble to reveal their true co: Hit the cloud bubbles to reveal their true color!
en.Clear bubbles around rocks to remove the: Remove the bubbles surrounding the rock to remove it!
en.Ring bubbles change color after your eve: Ring bubbles change their color after every move!
en.Little monster creates new bubbles every: The monster creates new bubbles every 3 moves!
en.No more videos:
THANK YOU!
You watched all available videos for today.
Come back tomorrow!

de.Multicolor booster makes match with any: Der Multicolor-Booster kann mit jeder Farbe kombiniert werden!
de.Aim booster helps you plan your moves!: Der Ziel-Booster hilft Dir, Deine Züge besser zu planen!
de.Need more moves? Use extra moves booster: Du brauchst mehr Züge? Hol Dir Extra-Züge mit dem Züge-Booster!
de.Match 3 or more bubbles!: Kombiniere 3 oder mehr Kugeln der gleichen Farbe!
de.Clear top bubbles to reveal ceiling ligh: Entferne die oberste Reihe Kugeln, um die Lichter freizugeben!
de.Clear bubbles around animals to free the: Entferne die Kugeln um die Tiere herum, um diese zu befreien!
de.Clear bubbles around the ghost to free h: Entferne die Kugeln um den Geist herum, um ihn zu befreien!
de.Match color of monster to defeat him!: Triff die Monster mit der passenden Farbe, um sie zu besiegen!
de.Hit cloud bubble to reveal their true co: Triff die Wolken-Kugeln, um ihre tatsächliche Farbe aufzudecken!
de.Clear bubbles around rocks to remove the: Entferne die Kugeln um den Fels herum, um ihn zu entfernen!
de.Ring bubbles change color after your eve: Ring-Kugeln wechseln ihre Farbe nach jedem Zug!
de.Little monster creates new bubbles every: Nach jeweils drei Zügen generieren die Monster neue Kugeln!
de.No more videos: VIELEN DANK! Du hast für heute bereits alle Videos gesehen, komm morgen wieder!.

es.Multicolor booster makes match with any: ¡El Potenciador Multicolor pega con cualquier color!
es.Bomb booster removes obstacles in your w: ¡El Potenciador de Bombas erradica obstáculos de tu camino!
es.Aim booster helps you plan your moves!: ¡El Potenciador de Objetivos te ayuda a planear tus movimientos!
es.Need more moves? Use extra moves booster: ¿Necesitas más movimientos? ¡Usa el Potenciador de Movimientos extra!
es.Match 3 or more bubbles!: ¡Empareja 3 o más burbujas del mismo color!
es.Clear top bubbles to reveal ceiling ligh: ¡Elimina las burbujas de la fila superior para destapar las luces del techo!
es.Clear bubbles around animals to free the: ¡Elimina las burbujas que rodean a los animales para liberarlos!
es.Clear bubbles around the ghost to free h: ¡Elimina las burbujas que rodean al fantasma para liberarlo!
es.Match color of monster to defeat him!: ¡Empareja del color del monstruo para derrotarlo!
es.Hit cloud bubble to reveal their true co: ¡Explota las burbujas-nube para destapar sus verdaderos colores!
es.Clear bubbles around rocks to remove the: ¡Elimina las burbujas que rodean la roca para eliminarla!
es.Ring bubbles change color after your eve: ¡Las burbujas-anillo cambian de color tras cada movimiento!
es.Little monster creates new bubbles every: ¡El monstruo crea nuevas burbujas cada 3 movimientos!
es.No more videos: ¡MUCHAS GRACIAS!  Has visto todos los vídeos disponibles hoy.  ¡Vuelve mañana!

fr.Multicolor booster makes match with any: Le booster multicolore correspond à toutes les couleurs!
fr.Bomb booster removes obstacles in your w: Le booster bombe supprime tous les obstacles sur votre chemin!
fr.Aim booster helps you plan your moves!: Le booster objectif vous aide à prévoir tes coups!
fr.Need more moves? Use extra moves booster: Besoin de plus de coups ? Utilisez le booster de coups supplémentaires!
fr.Match 3 or more bubbles!: Assemblez 3 bulles ou plus de même couleur!
fr.Clear top bubbles to reveal ceiling ligh: Retirez les bulles de la rangée du haut pour révéler les lumières sur le plafond!
fr.Clear bubbles around animals to free the: Retirez les bulles autour des animaux pour les libérer!
fr.Clear bubbles around the ghost to free h: Retirez les bulles autour du fantôme pour le libérer!
fr.Match color of monster to defeat him!: Assemblez les couleurs du monstre pour le battre!
fr.Hit cloud bubble to reveal their true co: Frappez les bulles nuages pour révéler leur vraie couleur!
fr.Clear bubbles around rocks to remove the: Retirez les bulles entourant la pierre pour la supprimer!
fr.Ring bubbles change color after your eve: Les bulles anneau changent de couleur après chaque coup!
fr.Little monster creates new bubbles every: Le monstre crée de nouvelles bulles tous les 3 coups!
fr.Black holes can devour 3 bubbles!: Les trous noirs peuvent engloutir 3 bulles!
fr.No more videos: MERCI! Vous avez regardé toutes les vidéos disponibles pour aujourd'hui. Revenez demain!

it.Multicolor booster makes match with any: Il Booster Multicolore si  abbina con qualsiasi colore!
it.Bomb booster removes obstacles in your w: La Bomba Booster rimuove gli ostacoli sulla tua strada!
it.Aim booster helps you plan your moves!: Il Booster Mira ti aiuta a pianificare le tue mosse!
it.Need more moves? Use extra moves booster: Hai bisogno di più mosse? Utilizza il Booster Mosse Extra!
it.Match 3 or more bubbles!: Abbina 3 o più bolle dello stesso colore!
it.Clear top bubbles to reveal ceiling ligh: Rimuovi le bolle nella riga superiore per svelare le luci sul soffitto!
it.Clear bubbles around animals to free the: Rimuovi le bolle attorno agli animali per liberarli!
it.Clear bubbles around the ghost to free h: Rimuovi le bolle attorno al fantasma per liberarlo!
it.Match color of monster to defeat him!: Abbina il colore con quello del mostro per sconfiggerlo!
it.Hit cloud bubble to reveal their true co: Colpisci le nuvole di bolle per svelare il loro vero colore!
it.Clear bubbles around rocks to remove the: Rimuovi le bolle attorno alla roccia per rimuoverla!
it.Ring bubbles change color after your eve: L'anello di bolle cambia il suo colore dopo ogni mossa!
it.Little monster creates new bubbles every: Il mostro crea nuove bolle ogni 3 mosse!
it.Black holes can devour 3 bubbles!: I buchi neri possono divorare 3 bolle!
it.No more videos: GRAZIE!  Hai guardato tutti i video disponibili di oggi.  Torna domani!

pt.Multicolor booster makes match with any: O Reforço Multicor combina com qualquer cor!
pt.Bomb booster removes obstacles in your w: O Reforço Bomba remove obstáculos do seu caminho!
pt.Aim booster helps you plan your moves!: O Reforço Objetivo ajuda-o a planear as suas jogadas!
pt.Need more moves? Use extra moves booster: Precisa de mais jogadas? Utilize o Reforço Jogadas Extra!
pt.Match 3 or more bubbles!: Combine 3 bolhas ou mais da mesma cor!
pt.Clear top bubbles to reveal ceiling ligh: Remova as bolhas na fila superior para mostrar as luzes no teto!
pt.Clear bubbles around animals to free the: Remova as bolhas à volta dos animais para libertá-los!
pt.Clear bubbles around the ghost to free h: Remova as bolhas à volta do fantasma para libertá-lo!
pt.Match color of monster to defeat him!: Combine a cor do monstro para derrotá-lo!
pt.Hit cloud bubble to reveal their true co: Acerte nas bolhas das nuvens para mostrar a sua verdadeira cor!
pt.Clear bubbles around rocks to remove the: Remova as bolhas à volta da rocha para removê-la!
pt.Ring bubbles change color after your eve: As bolhas anel mudam de cor após cada jogada!
pt.Little monster creates new bubbles every: O monstro cria novas bolhas a cada 3 jogadas!
pt.Black holes can devour 3 bubbles!: Os buracos negros podem devorar 3 bolhas!
pt.No more videos: OBRIGADO! Viu todos os vídeos disponíveis para hoje. Volte amanhã!

ru.Bomb booster removes obstacles in your w: Бомбовый бустер убирает препятствия с пути!
ru.Need more moves? Use extra moves booster: Нужно больше шагов? Используйте дополнительные Шаговые бустеры!
ru.Match 3 or more bubbles!: Соберите 3 и больше пузырей одного цвета!
ru.Clear top bubbles to reveal ceiling ligh: Уберите пузыри в верхнем ряду, чтобы открыть лампочки на потолке!
ru.Clear bubbles around animals to free the: Уберите пузыри вокруг животного, чтобы освободить его!
ru.Clear bubbles around the ghost to free h: Уберите пузыри привидения животного, чтобы освободить его!
ru.Match color of monster to defeat him!: Найдите пузырь в цвет монстра, чтобы его победить!
ru.Hit cloud bubble to reveal their true co: Лопайте облачные пузыри, чтобы узнать их настоящий цвет!
ru.Clear bubbles around rocks to remove the: Уберите пузыри вокруг камня, чтобы убрать и его!
ru.Ring bubbles change color after your eve: Кольцевые пузыри меняют цвет после каждого движения!
ru.Little monster creates new bubbles every: Монстр делает новые пузыри через каждые 3 шага!
ru.No more videos: СПАСИБО! Вы просмотрели все доступные на сегодня видео. Возвращайтесь завтра!

tr.Multicolor booster makes match with any: Çok renkli Destekçi her renk ile eşleşir!
tr.Bomb booster removes obstacles in your w: Bomba Destekçisi yolundaki her şeyi siler!
tr.Aim booster helps you plan your moves!: Yardım Destekçisi hamlelerini planlamaya yardım eder!
tr.Need more moves? Use extra moves booster: Daha fazla hamlemi lazım? Ekstra Hamle Destekçisini Kullan!
tr.Match 3 or more bubbles!: Aynı renkteki 3 veya daha fazla balonu eşleştir!
tr.Clear top bubbles to reveal ceiling ligh: Tavandaki ışığı çıkarmak için üst sıradaki balonları kaldır!
tr.Clear bubbles around animals to free the: Hayvanları serbest bırakmak için çevresindeki balonları kaldır!
tr.Clear bubbles around the ghost to free h: Hayaleti serbest bırakmak için çevresindeki balonları kaldır!
tr.Hit cloud bubble to reveal their true co: Gerçek renklerini ortaya çıkarmak için bulut balonunu vur!
tr.Clear bubbles around rocks to remove the: Kayayı kaldırmak için çevresindeki balonları kaldır!
tr.Ring bubbles change color after your eve: Her hamleden sonra balon değişikliğini çağır!
tr.Little monster creates new bubbles every: Canavar her 3 hamlede yeni balonlar oluşturmakta!
tr.No more videos: TEŞEKKÜR EDERİZ! Bugün mevcut olan tüm videoları izledin. Yarın yine gel!

nl.Multicolor booster makes match with any: De multibooster past bij elke kleur!
nl.Bomb booster removes obstacles in your w: De Bombooster verwijdert obstakels die je in de weg zitten!
nl.Aim booster helps you plan your moves!: De richtbooster helpt je je volgende zetten te plannen!
nl.Need more moves? Use extra moves booster: Meer zetten nodig? Gebruik de extra zettenbooster!
nl.Match 3 or more bubbles!: Pas drie of meer bubbels van dezelfde kleur bijelkaar!
nl.Clear top bubbles to reveal ceiling ligh: Verwijder de bubbels in de bovenste rij om het licht in het plafond te onthullen!
nl.Clear bubbles around animals to free the: Verwijder de bubbels om de dieren om ze vrij te laten!
nl.Clear bubbles around the ghost to free h: Verwijder de bubbels om de geest om hem vrij te laten!
nl.Match color of monster to defeat him!: Maak de kleur van het monster passend om het te verslaan!
nl.Hit cloud bubble to reveal their true co: Raak de wolkenbubbels om hun echte kleur te onthullen!
nl.Clear bubbles around rocks to remove the: Verwijder de bubbels om de rots om deze te verwijderen!
nl.Ring bubbles change color after your eve: Ringbubbels veanderen van kleur na elke zet!
nl.Little monster creates new bubbles every: Het monster maakt nieuwe bubbels om de drie zetten!
nl.Black holes can devour 3 bubbles!: Zwarte gaten kunnen drie bubbels laten verdwijnen!
nl.No more videos: BEDANKT! Je hebt alle beschikbare video's voor vandaag gezien. Kom morgen terug!

pl.Multicolor booster makes match with any: Kolorowy Wspomagacz pasuje do każdego koloru!
pl.Bomb booster removes obstacles in your w: Wspomagacz Bomb usuwa przeszkody z Twojej drogi!
pl.Aim booster helps you plan your moves!: Wspomagacz Celowania pomaga Ci zaplanować Twoje działania!
pl.Need more moves? Use extra moves booster: Potrzebujesz więcej ruchów? Użyj Wspomagacza Ekstra Ruchów!
pl.Match 3 or more bubbles!: Połącz 3 lub więcej baniek tego samego koloru!
pl.Clear top bubbles to reveal ceiling ligh: Usuń bańki w najwyższym rzędzie, aby odkryć światła na suficie!
pl.Clear bubbles around animals to free the: Usuń bańki otaczające zwierzęta, by je uwolnić!
pl.Clear bubbles around the ghost to free h: Usuń bańki otaczające ducha, by go uwolnić!
pl.Match color of monster to defeat him!: Dopasuj kolor do potwora, aby go pokonać!
pl.Hit cloud bubble to reveal their true co: Trafiaj w chmury, aby odkryć prawdziwy kolor baniek!
pl.Clear bubbles around rocks to remove the: Usuń bańki otaczające kamień, by go usunąć!
pl.Ring bubbles change color after your eve: Bańki kołowe zmieniają swój kolor po każdym ruchu!
pl.Little monster creates new bubbles every: Potwór tworzy nowe bańki co 3 ruchy!
pl.No more videos: Dzięki! Oglądałeś wszystkie dostępne filmy dzisiaj. Wróć jutro!

ja.Free all animals!: すべての動物を解放しろ！
ja.Free the ghost!: ゴーストをかいほうしろ！
ja.Clear the top!: 最上ラインをクリアにしろ！
ja.Multicolor booster makes match with any:
マルチカラーブースターはど
の色ともマッチできる！
ja.Bomb booster removes obstacles in your w:
ボムブースターは邪魔
なものを消してくれる！
ja.Aim booster helps you plan your moves!:
エイムブースターはどこに打つか
の手助けをしてくれる！
ja.Need more moves? Use extra moves booster:
移動回数が足りないときは
エクストラムーブブースター！
ja.Match 3 or more bubbles!:
３個以上の同じ色の
バブルをマッチしよう！
ja.Clear top bubbles to reveal ceiling ligh:
最上段のバブルをどかして
天井の光を解放しよう！
ja.Clear bubbles around animals to free the:
動物たちの周りにあるバブルを
マッチして解放してあげよう！
ja.Clear bubbles around the ghost to free h:
ゴーストの周りにあるバブルを
マッチして解放してあげよう！
ja.Match color of monster to defeat him!:
モンスターの色を
マッチさせて倒そう！
ja.Hit cloud bubble to reveal their true co:
クラウドバブルに当
てて何色か見抜こう！
ja.Clear bubbles around rocks to remove the:
岩の周りにあるバブルを
どかして岩を壊そう！
ja.Ring bubbles change color after your eve:
バブルを打つたびにリン
グバブルは色を変えるぞ！
ja.Little monster creates new bubbles every:
モンスターはバブルを３回打つた
びに新しくバブルを作るぞ！
ja.Black holes can devour 3 bubbles!:
ブラックホールは3つの
バブルを食い奪うぞ！
ja.Thanks for watching!:
見てくれて
ありがとう！
ja.No more videos:

は終了したからまた明日！
